context_of_use: This use case allows power users to manage their accounts by registering, logging in, updating profile information, and resetting passwords.
description: Enables power users to register accounts, log in, reset passwords, and update basic profile information.
triggering_event: Power user initiates account management actions.
preconditions: Power user has access to the account management interface.
postconditions: Power user successfully registers, logs in, updates profile, or resets password.
assumptions: Power user has internet access to interact with the system.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to register accounts.
The system shall allow users to log in securely.
The system shall allow users to update their profile information.
The system shall allow users to reset their passwords.
main_flow: 1. power user → System displays registration form.
2. power user fills out registration form → System creates user account.
3. power user → System displays login form.
4. power user enters credentials → System verifies credentials and grants access.
5. power user → System displays profile information.
6. power user updates profile information → System saves updated information.
7. power user requests password reset → System sends password reset instructions.
